resources.string:
I am an experienced and passionate android developer with expertise in Kotlin and understanding of Java as well.
I thrive on transforming innovative ideas into functional and user-friendly applications.
I have profound knowledge on API integration, Dependency Injection, Retrofit, git and github, databases, Material design, Navigation, Firebase, WorkManager, and architectural patterns such as MVVM to name a few.
I'm Experienced in crafting efficient code, optimizing UI/UX, and collaborating within agile teams.
I'm Constantly exploring new technologies to stay at the forefront of Android development trends.
Let's code the future together\!\ðŸ˜Š
